From ancient times, emperors and kings who received the mandate, how have they ever not performed feng and shan? There have indeed been those who performed the rituals without their proper omens, but there have never been those who saw auspicious signs appear yet did not proceed to Mount Tai. Though received mandate yet merit not reach, reached Liang Fu already yet virtue not harmonious, harmonious already yet days have not sufficient, therefore approach affairs use rare. Tradition says: 'Three years not do rites, rites certainly waste;' Three years not do music, music certainly bad.' Every generation's prosperity, then feng shan respond there, reach decline then rest. Their distant ones thousand have remaining years, near ones several hundred years, therefore their rites lacking completely extinguished, their details cannot obtained and record heard say.

Shang Shu says: Shun at Xuan Ji Yu Heng, with align seven governances. Then sacrifice to Supreme God, offer to Six Ancestors, look at mountains rivers, extensively various spirits. Gather five auspicious objects, select lucky months days, see four peaks various shepherds, return auspicious objects. Year second month, east inspect hunt, arrive at Dai Zong. Dai Zong, Mount Tai also. Burnt offering, look at arrange mountains rivers. Then audience Eastern Lords. Eastern Lords, feudal lords also. Unite seasons months correct days, same pitch pipes measures weights, repair five rites, five jades three silks two living one dead offerings. Fifth month, inspect hunt arrive Southern Peak. Southern Peak, Mount Heng also. Eighth month, inspect hunt arrive Western Peak. Western Peak, Mount Hua also. Eleventh month, inspect hunt arrive Northern Peak. Northern Peak, Mount Heng also. All like Dai Zong rites. Central Peak, Song Gao also. Five years one inspect hunt.

After eight generations, arrive Emperor Tai Wu, have mulberry millet grow in courtyard, one evening large embrace, fear. Yi Zhi say: 'Monsters not overcome virtue.' Tai Wu cultivate virtue, mulberry millet die. Yi Zhi assist Wu Xian, Wu Xian's rise from this begin. After fourteen generations, Emperor Wu Ding obtain Fu Yue as chancellor, Yin revive there, call Gao Zong. Have pheasant climb cauldron ear crow, Wu Ding fear. Zu Ji say: 'Cultivate virtue.' Wu Ding follow it, position with eternal peace. After five generations, Emperor Wu Yi disrespect spirits and thunder die. After three generations, Emperor Zhou licentious disorder, Wu Wang attack him. From this observe, beginning never not reverent respectful, after gradually negligent also.

Qin Mu Gong ascended position nine years, Qi Huan Gong already hegemon, assemble feudal lords at Kui Qiu, and wish feng shan. Now phoenixes unicorns not come, auspicious grains not grow, but thistles weeds flourish, owls frequently arrive, and wish feng shan, not perhaps impossible?' Therefore Huan Gong then stopped. Now Son of Heaven established sacrifices, Tai Yi, Hou Tu, three years personally suburban sacrificed, established Han family feng shan, five years one repaired feng.
